item.title: Spotify’s latest feature lets you transfer playlists from other services
item.description: Spotify has partnered with TuneMyMusic on a new in-app feature that lets users import their playlists from other streaming services.

item.title: India’s TCS gets TPG to fund half of $2B AI data center project
item.description: TCS and private equity firm TPG will invest up to $2 billion to build data centers for AI training and inference in India.

item.title: Another fire breaks out at aluminum plant that supplies Ford
item.description: It's the second major fire -- and the third overall -- in the last few months at the Novelis plant in Oswego, NY.

item.title: Google releases Nano Banana Pro, its latest image generation model
item.description: Google is upgrading its image generation model with new editing chops, higher resolutions, more accurate text rendering, and the ability to search the...

item.title: As its voice dictation app takes off, Wispr secures $25M from Notable Capital
item.description: Voice AI company Wispr is raising $25 million in funding merely months after its $30 million Series A.
